component.name: Actual Budget
component.summary: White label app framework for building local-first app solutions

description.p: Actual White Label is a white label app framework for building local-first app solutions. It prioritizes user control, allowing you to build applications where users manage their data independently with multi-device sync and optional end-to-end encryption. The framework emphasizes user involvement and provides quick, intuitive tools while keeping users in charge of their data.

Designed for speed, Actual White Label has a streamlined architecture that minimizes complexity, making it easy to build and deploy local-first applications. It operates locally, ensuring functionality without a network connection while syncing data across devices. This local-first approach also enhances privacy through end-to-end encryption.

The framework provides a solid foundation for building applications with flexible data models. It simplifies data management with a minimal, efficient interface and supports extensibility through plugins and custom integrations. Additionally, Actual White Label offers powerful customization options, enabling developers to build applications that suit their specific needs.
Check out the full release notes on our website.
